note.p: Belgian nurseryman and horticulturist. Florist’s apprentice, 1806. Gardener, 1807–10. From 1810, headed the Jacob-Makoy nursery in Liege. Founding member of the horticultural society of Liege, 1830. Developed several new varieties of garden plants, especially orchids and peonies.
La Belgique Horticole: Annales d’Horticulture Belge et Etrangère (1874): 5–18.
